data: For use by or in consultation with Addiction or Psychiatry Services
All new orders for benzodiazepines must be approved by consult services
BID, If temperature greater than 38.5 DegC contact consult services or most responsible medical provider
Select alcohol ethyl (VODKA) or alcohol ethyl (BEER)
Physician to complete maximum doses/24 hours
50 mL, PO, other (see comment), drug form: oral liq
355 mL, PO, PRN other (see comment), drug form: oral liq
If/when patient is unsteady on feet, appears unstable, slurred speech and / or slow verbal responses, then HOLD Managed Alcohol orders and contact consult services
